attributes.action: Have a better police presence in low income areas
attributes.additional_details: As a young person, i believe that it is important for a police presence to be on the streets so it will not only decrease gang knife crime but also allowing people to walk up to them to ask for help/report a crime. It will make criminals scared to try and rob/kill people, at the moment there are multiple stabbings/robberies happening a night, a police presence will reduce this heavily.
attributes.background: I want the government to make police roam the streets at night so that knife crime and robberies are as minimal as possible

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about deploying local law enforcement resources is a matter for your local police force. 

You could raise this issue with your elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You can find out who your local PCC is at this website: 
https://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
